data.title: bd-3o6,bd-yp0,bd-mkh,bd-mxg,bd-29u,bd-13n5: 6 code quality fixes
data.description:
Batch of 6 code quality fixes:
1. bd-3o6: resolve_divergent_working_copy &str→&Path (type safety)
2. bd-yp0: Check git push --tags exit status (error handling)
3. bd-mkh: Pass jj_cwd to push_tags (remove redundant call)
4. bd-mxg: Rename root→cwd params (clarity)
5. bd-29u: Fix git-ism in upgrade (correctness)
6. bd-13n5: exec::run returns error instead of process::exit (code quality)
